languages.text: "Потребуются крепкие снаряды и мишени — Глейто неудержим, когда действует в полную силу". {n}Соломон приподнимает уголки губ.{/n} "Благодарю".
"The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."
languages.original_text: "Потребуются крепкие снаряды и мишени — Глейто неудержим, когда действует в полную силу". {n}Соломон приподнимает уголки губ.{/n} "Благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth turn up.{/n} "Thank you."
"The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth turn up.{/n} "Thank you."
"The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upwards.{/n} "Thank you."
"The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upwards.{/n} "Thank you."
"The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."
"The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

languages.text: 「装備は頑丈でなければなりません。グライトが本気を出したら、誰にも止められませんから」{n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかにほころんだ。{/n}「ありがとうございます」
languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: 「装備は頑丈でなければなりません。グライトが本気を出したら、誰にも止められませんから」{n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかにほころんだ。{/n}「ありがとうございます」

languages.text: "Alles müsste sehr stabil sein – Glaito ist nicht aufzuhalten, wenn er sich nicht zurückhält." {n}Solomornes Mundwinkel heben sich nach oben.{/n} "Danke."
languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Alles müsste sehr stabil sein – Glaito ist nicht aufzuhalten, wenn er sich nicht zurückhält." {n}Solomornes Mundwinkel heben sich nach oben.{/n} "Danke."

languages.text: « Pour cela, il nous faudra un équipement particulièrement solide. Glaito est redoutable quand rien ne le retient, {n}affirme Solomorne tandis que ses lèvres s'étirent en un fin sourire.{/n} Merci. »
languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: « Pour cela, il nous faudra un équipement particulièrement solide. Glaito est redoutable quand rien ne le retient, {n}affirme Solomorne tandis que ses lèvres s'étirent en un fin sourire.{/n} Merci. »

languages.text: «El equipo tendrá que ser muy resistente; Glaito es imparable cuando no se contiene». {n}Las comisuras de los labios de Solomorne se curvan hacia arriba.{/n} «Gracias».
languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: «El equipo tendrá que ser muy resistente; Glaito es imparable cuando no se contiene». {n}Las comisuras de los labios de Solomorne se curvan hacia arriba.{/n} «Gracias».

languages.text: “准备的东西得结实些，格雷托在兴头上的时候根本拦不住。”{n}索罗蒙的嘴角翘了起来。{/n}“谢谢你。”
languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: “准备的东西得结实些，格雷托在兴头上的时候根本拦不住。”{n}索罗蒙的嘴角翘了起来。{/n}“谢谢你。”

languages.text: "Ekipmanlar epey sağlam olmalı. Glaito gözünü kararttığında durdurulamaz." {n}Solomorne'un ağzının kenarları yukarı doğru kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Ekipmanlar epey sağlam olmalı. Glaito gözünü kararttığında durdurulamaz." {n}Solomorne'un ağzının kenarları yukarı doğru kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim."

languages.original_text: "The equipment needs to be sturdy — Glaito is unstoppable when he's not holding back." {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth curl upward.{/n} "Thank you."
